---
title: Postmedia Network
author: ''
date: '2022-09-12'
slug: postmedia_network
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $3.2M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Postmedia Network. The average
  contract duration was 0.79 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $369.6K. The longest
  contract was 4 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $12.0M.
lookup_name: 'POSTMEDIA NETWORK'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '3.2M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '36'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '5'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '14%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '144%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1.4'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '6.7M'
s424_mean_duration: '0.79'
s421_mean_contract_value: '369.6K'
s425_max_duration: '4'
s422_max_contract_value: '12.0M'
---
